item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Lockheed Martin, Northrop Grumman, Gap, Alcoa & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in the premarket.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase reaches deal to become Apple Card issuer as Goldman closes chapter on consumer foray
item.description: JPMorgan Chase has reached a deal to take over the Apple credit card from Goldman Sachs, the two banks said late Wednesday.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Mobileye, GameStop, Chevron & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: JPMorgan's asset management will no longer use controversial proxy advisors for shareholder votes
item.description: JPMorgan said it is instead using artificial intelligence to aggregate and analyze proxy data.

item.title: Ryan Cohen could be in for a big payday, but he has to grow meme darling GameStop to $100 billion
item.description: The board of GameStop granted Cohen performance-based stock options tied to a $100 billion market-capitalization target.
